member.name: T:CipherLib.CipherItems
member.summary: Provides methods for handling cipher items.

member.name: M:CipherLib.CipherItems.CreateCipher(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the Cipher.
member.remarks: Must be called after the CreateItems() or SetInsertItems() methods.

member.name: M:CipherLib.CipherItems.CreateItems
member.summary: Creates the InsertItems.

member.name: M:CipherLib.CipherItems.CreateReceivedItems(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get bytes from sourceCipher index values knowing only the index locations.
member.param: Indicates if the current object values should be set.

member.name: M:CipherLib.CipherItems.CreatePlainText(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the Plain Text value.
member.remarks: Must be called after the CreateItems() or SetInsertItems() methods.

member.name: M:CipherLib.CipherItems.SetInsertValues(CipherLib.InsertItems)
member.summary: Initializes the internal InsertItems properties.

member.name: T:CipherLib.InsertItem
member.summary: Represents a byte[] Insert Item.

member.name: P:CipherLib.InsertItem.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item Name.

member.name: P:CipherLib.InsertItem.InsertIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item Index.

member.name: P:CipherLib.InsertItem.InsertValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item Value.

member.name: T:CipherLib.InsertItemNameComparer
member.summary: Sort and search on Name value.

member.name: T:CipherLib.InsertItems
member.summary: Represents a collection of InsertItem objects.

member.name: M:CipherLib.InsertItems.Add(System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates and adds the element from the supplied values.

member.name: M:CipherLib.InsertItems.LJCSortIndex
member.summary: Sort on InsertIndex.

member.name: M:CipherLib.InsertItems.LJCSortName(CipherLib.InsertItemNameComparer)
member.summary: Sort on Name.

member.name: T:CipherLib.SendCipher
member.summary: Provides methods to deal with a SendCipher.

member.name: M:CipherLib.SendCipher.#ctor(CipherLib.InsertItems)
member.summary: Initializes an object instance.

member.name: M:CipherLib.SendCipher.GetInsertItemValue(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Returns the insert value from the sendCipher by name.

member.name: M:CipherLib.SendCipher.GetSendCipher(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the SendCipher value.
member.remarks: Sets InsertIndex values that are beyond the end of the Cipher to the Cipher length.

member.name: M:CipherLib.SendCipher.SendCipherToCipher(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the Cipher value.
member.remarks: Calculates the data indexes based on the InsertItems definitions.
